entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. entry.title: stephane957/Boggle-Battle: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.
entry.content: Boggle Battle is a real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic word game, built for head-to-head competition between two players. This lightweight project combines React for responsive frontend interactions with a Flask backend and SQLite database to manage game state and word validation.

entry.title: meliodas-sama1248/Motion-Detector-Chrome-Extension: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.
